summary: BOUGHT CAR IN OCTOBER 2000 BRAND NEW AND TO DATE HAVE HAD 6 PROBLEMS.  1) MARCH 2001 MOTOR FOR DRIVER SIDE WINDOW HAD TO BE REPLACED.  2) DECEMBER 2001 CD PLAYER STOPPED WORKING TEMPORARILY.  3) 4/8/02 CHECK ENGINE LITE CAME ON, DEALER FOUND NO PROBLEM.  4) 4/30/02  CHECK ENGINE LITE CAME ON, THIS TIME DEALER HAD TO REPLACE IGNITION COIL.  5) 10/24/02 CHECK ENGINE LITE CAME ON, DEALER FOUND NO PROBLEM.  6) 12/27/02 CHECK ENGINE LITE CAME ON, DEALER HAS TO REPLACE CATALYTIC CONVERTER TS
